mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, categoryName, aliasName, t2.articleCount FROM category t1 JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT categoryId id, count(id) articleCount FROM article GROUP BY categoryId ) t2 ON t1.id = t2.id ORDER BY articleCount DESC
SELECT id,categoryName,aliasName,sort FROM category where id = #{id}

select count(id) from category where (categoryName=#{categoryName} or aliasName = #{aliasName})
and id != #{id}
select count(id) from article where categoryId = #{categoryId} and status = 1
